Greetings to head of state of Libya
    Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, today sent a message of greetings to Col. Moammer El Gaddafi, leader of the Great September First Revolution, on the occasion of the 33rd anniversary of the withdrawal of the U.S. military bases from Libya.
 The message expressed the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would as ever grow stronger and develop and wished him greater success in his work to protect the national dignity and achieve the progress and prosperity of the country.
